mapper.update:
update company_registration_info
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
county_code = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
town_code = #{townCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_type_id = #{unitTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit_address = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_num = #{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_social = #{unitSocial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

legal_person_name = #{legalPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
worker_num = #{workerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company_registration_info set unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, county_code = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, town_code = #{townCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_type_id = #{unitTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_address = #{unitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_num = #{unitNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_social = #{unitSocial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_category_id = #{industryCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_name = #{legalPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worker_num = #{workerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_checked = #{isChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER} where unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM company_registration_info,dictionary WHERE company_registration_info.is_checked=dictionary.dictionary_id
AND company_registration_info.unit_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{unitName},"%")
AND company_registration_info.phone like CONCAT("%",#{phone},"%")
